channel.title: Meta PM Interview Prep
channel.description: 3-hour deep dive into Meta's PM interview process. Two coaches walk through 26 questions with perfect answers across all 5 interview rounds: Product Sense, Analytical Thinking, Project Retrospective, XFN Partnership, and Operating at Meta. Built for IC7 candidates.
channel.itunes:author: Amanda Bradford

item.title: Full Episode: Meta PM Interview Prep (All 5 Rounds)
item.description: Complete 3-hour walkthrough of Meta's PM interview. Covers both IC7 roles (Pro Tools Subscription + SMB Monetization), 10 Product Sense questions, 4 Execution questions, 4 Project Retrospective questions, 4 XFN Partnership questions, and 4 Operating at Meta questions. Every question has 2 different perfect answers. Frameworks: BUS, GAME, STAR, DIGS, RICE.

item.title: EP 1: Product Sense — Questions 1-5 (Intro + Job Context)
item.description: Deep dive on both IC7 roles (Varun's Pro Tools Subscription + Nikhil's SMB Monetization), then 5 Product Sense questions: Design a professional tools subscription, Improve Meta Verified, Design a fitness app for Meta, Next big thing for Instagram, Monetize WhatsApp.

item.title: EP 2: Product Sense — Questions 6-10 (+ AI Product Sense)
item.description: Creator monetization for Instagram, Meta AI chat metrics, AI meeting attendance problem, Improve Instagram Shopping, Build for small business success. Includes both AI Product Sense questions.

item.title: EP 3: Execution + Project Retrospective
item.description: Subscription metrics, debugging engagement drops, prioritization, plus behavioral answers with The League as the anchor story. GAME and STAR/DIGS frameworks.

item.title: EP 4: XFN Partnership + Operating at Meta + Outro
item.description: Influence without authority, conflict resolution, stakeholder navigation, Why Meta, and the final framework recap with confidence boost.
